coreAtributes.authorTag: On the protective sleeve, rubbberized ink reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's ballistic goggles
coreAtributes.description: A pair of well-ventilated goggles with impact resistant polycarbonate lenses. When not in use, they can be slid into a protective sleeve. The headband has a lot of adjustment available to fit a variety of head sizes.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] on the ballistic goggles and [npc.verb(adjust)] the headband until they're comfortable.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the ballistic goggles onto [npc2.namePos] [npc.face] and [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.her] [npc2.verb(adjust)] the headband until they're comfortable.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] the ballistic goggles onto [npc2.namePos] [npc2.face] and [npc.verb(tighten)] the headband as much as possible.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the headband on [npc.her] ballistic goggles and [npc.verb(take)] them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the headband on [npc2.namePos] ballistic goggles and [npc.verb(take)] them off.
